attributes.action: Support the hair and beauty industry the same way you supported hospitality
attributes.additional_details: I work in the beauty industry and many of us have received very little support during the pandemic or couldn't receive help. Hospitality suffered but when they suffer so does beauty! With weddings cancelled and rescheduled, prom season missed and no clubs open many of us have a huge reduction in clients, "Glam about to help out" would encourage people to return and spend money in small beauty businesses and salons again
attributes.background: Produce a scheme for the month of September called "Glam about to help out" and provide the same upto £10 discount off of treatments that eat out to help out received for participating businesses
